# p5-elements
p5-elements is a set of UI components of the game, Persona 5 by Atlus.
These are recreated with web design technology.

# Demo
[準備中]()

# Install
```shell
npm i p5-elements -D
```

# Usage
Import into your module script:
```ts
import { P5Toggle } from 'p5-elements';
```
Alternatively, load a bundled version from the dist folder or from CDN:
```html
<script src="https://unpkg.com/p5-elements@latest/dist/p5-elements.js"></script>
```
